mapper.insert: INSERT INTO category (id, title, artist, genre, mood, era, region, visible, rdate) VALUES(CATE_SEQ.nextval, #{title}, #{artist}, #{genre}, #{mood}, #{era}, #{region}, #{visible}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, artist, genre, mood, era, region, rdate, seqno FROM category ORDER BY seqno ASC
